name: Corypheus' Cheesemaker
description:
Corypheus' Cheesemaker

By Kat Krulewitz

Gruyere Asiago De La Vache,  the greatest cheesemaker in Thedas, is on top of the world after winning a prestigious cheesemaking competition.  Unfortunately,  however, this  success leads to him being kidnapped by a magister and forced to serve as the official cheesemaker of Corypheus' army. 

 Choose whether Gruyere helps the Inquisition or Corypheus in this short fan game set during the events of Dragon Age Inquisition.

Content warning for comic violence and discussions of death.
